ikuth (7da) sawasa 4.00ta pamana balapitiya modarawaththa dhiwara thotupalen dhiwara katayuthu sandaha giya dhiwara yathra wisihatharen yathra dahayak pamana danata godabimata godagasa thibe.ema dhiwara yathra balapitiya pradeshaye randombae, walagedara, wallawaththa, wallabada, ahungalla saha kosgoda yana pradeshawalin dhiwara katayuthu sandaha giya dhiwara yathra bawa dhiwarayo pawasathi.balapitiya pradeshaye muhudu yana ekdina dhiwara yathrawaka dhiwarayan thundenek pamana dhiwara katayuthuwala yedena nisa miyagiya dhiwarayin wisipasdenata amathara thawath dhiwarayin thispahak pamana methek godabimata pamina nathi bawa dhiwarayo pawasathi.sada sulangath samanga pamini chanda rala paharata hasuwimen gasagena giya dhiwara yathra da methek hamuwi natha.anathurata pathwimen pasuwa muhudu rala samanga porabadamin jiwithayath maranayath athara satan karamin godabimata pamini dhiwarayan dahanamadenaku balapitiya mulika rohale 01, 02 saha 12 yana wattuwala prathikara labamin sitithi.muhudu jalaya pewimen, galparawala wadimen hise amaruwa, hadawath amaruwa, daswala wali yama, aswalin kadulu galima aadi rogabadhawalata da me dhiwarayo lakwa sitithi.pasugiya (6 da) dhiwara karmanthaya sandaha balapitiya modarawaththa dhiwara warayen muhudu giya dhiwara yathrawalata malu aswanna hodin labima nisa sulan thaththwaya tikak thibunath poya dinawala dhiwara katayuthuwalin walaki siti nisa darupawul jiwath kara ganima sandaha rakiyawak kara ganima muhudu gos giyath kisindu dinaka nudutu wiru anathurakata muhunadun bawa ekdina dhiwara yathrawaka skiparwarayaku wana rammuthu nishantha mahatha pawasiya.ahase kaluwarasawasa 4.00ta berathuduwa pradeshayen muhudu yamata balapitiya dhiwara thotupalata awith ayis labagena dhiwara katayuthu sandaha pitathwuna.
ehenam kukula maru wuna..
